tool_description: Evaluates technical accuracy and depth of knowledge demonstrated in interview responses for technical roles and skill-specific questions.

technical_domain.description: Technical domain or field of expertise

experience_level.description: Expected experience level: entry, mid, senior, expert

assessment_depth.description: Assessment depth level: basic, standard, comprehensive

error_messages: Array length mismatch: Responses and questions arrays must have equal length
Invalid experience level: Use one of [entry, mid, senior, expert]
Invalid assessment depth: Use one of [basic, standard, comprehensive]
Unknown technical domain: Provide a recognized technical field
Insufficient technical content: Responses lack technical substance for assessment
usage: Provide responses and questions arrays, specify technical_domain and experience_level, optionally set assessment_depth. Returns detailed technical accuracy evaluation.
